message: Let's split it down the middle, Bob. No need for haggling.
I'll take the majority, but I'm willing to give you a decent chunk.
I'll give you a slight edge, but I'm not going to let you take everything. Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take a bigger share, but I'm still willing to give you something.
I'm running out of options, Bob. I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to give up entirely. This is my last offer.
